title: Apple faces supply-chain issues, but can its buying power keep earnings on track?
text:
This couple retired in Colombia on $4,000 a month. In California, ‘to live this lifestyle, we'd have to be mega, mega millionaires'

This adventure-seeking couple has lived in Panama, Colombia and is eyeing Spain in a few years. See full story.

David Tepper shuns stock market: ‘Sometimes there's times to make money … sometimes there's times not to lose money'

David Tepper, billionaire investor and one of the world's top hedge-fund managers, isn't a fan of the stock market, right now. See full story.

California's ‘atmospheric rivers' bring limited rain relief — a look at the Western drought by the numbers

Moderate to heavy rain fell across Northern California heading into a weekend that's expected bring stormy weather to the drought-ravaged state, which is among the hardest hit as the U.S. West continues to strain under dry conditions. See full story.

The ‘Mother Memes' fall as retail investors rotate into the frothy MAGA meme trade

GameStop and AMC Entertainment slump as Trump's unconsummated SPAC deal grips the psyche of Reddit. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

The hit play chronicles the history of Lehman Brothers, and warns of what happens when markets become too complex See full story.
